channel.title: Motion Traxx: Upbeat Workout Music for Running and General Exercise
channel.itunes:author: Deekron 'The Fitness DJ'
channel.description: When it comes to fitness, nothing moves you like music. Produced by Deekron ‘The Fitness DJ’(TM), Motion Traxx features energizing, steady-beat workout music. Perfect for setting the pace of your runs. Also great for other forms of exercise such as cycling, aerobics, general workouts, or just ‘getting down’ to some fun, non-stop dance mixes. Free. For more info and our newsletter, please visit www.MotionTraxx.com
